name: AiresVoiceAssistant
0:
”Alexa, Open My Ava”
”Alexa, Launch My Ava”
”Alexa, Start My Ava”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my ava
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Aires Voice Assistant is here to help you throughout your mobility journey. Once connected, ask Alexa questions about your most recent relocation to receive personalized information and support. Connect and ask the Aires Voice Assistant questions like:
▪ What can Ava do?
▪ How do I submit a reimbursement?

To use this skill, you must first link your account via MobilityX or through the Amazon Alexa Mobile App.
